This is the last straw. You will not let these criminals get away with this horrible crime. Today...YOU TAKE A STAND!


Rule-Set
Stolen (but then changed...a bit) from mallowgeno

1) I, Ant_to_the_max, have the final say in any and all disputes.
2) In the event that I do make a mistake, PM it to me and I will fix it. NOTE: Vote count mistakes and be placed in the topic in bold. Thanks!
3) FYI ORANGE is mine. MINE!
4) Anything I say to another player is not to be quoted.
5) Players may NEVER PM each other about game related content. This is to ONLY be done in your QT, if you have one, at the appropriate time.
6) Small or invisible text is banned. You are not allowed to use coded messages either.
7) I will require players to post at least once every 48 hours. This is to keep the game moving. If you go more than 48 hours without posting I will prod you. If you don't post within 48 hours of the prod, you will be replaced. After the 3rd prod, if I have to prod you again I will just replace you instead.
8) V/LA's are to be posted in-thread in BOLD.
9) Weekends count as 24 hours
10) Days will last 2 Weeks
11) Nights will last 2 Days
12) To vote, post Vote: Player. To unvote, post Unvote. I do not require unvotes, but they are appreciated. Also, using the vote tags are greatly appreciated as well.
13) majority=(X Players+1 (If odd number))/2. So if 13 players exist, a majority would be 7.
14) Once a majority is reached, votes will not change. Players may continue to talk until I post the death scene.
15) If a majority isn't reached by the deadline, no lynch will occur that day.
16) Once you're dead, well, you're dead. No further speaking is allowed. No "Bah!" posts allowed.
17) Remember, this is a game! Play to win and have fun!
18) Modkilled players will become Neutral Survivors with a zero chance of winning.
19) Don't be stupid.
20) These Rules are subject to change.

Sample VT PM:
You are a Vanilla Townie! Besides tasting really good, you have no special powers.
You win with the town when all the mafia members are dead. Good luck!
The thread is located here, viewtopic.php?f=2&t=18683
Please PM me to confirm your role

Game is starting now.

AS OF THIS POINT, Shion Sonozaki and Heliman have yet to open their role PM's. They have 24 hours to post in this thread, or I will be replacing them.

It is now day 1! Deadline is MONDAY, AUGUST 22st AT 11:59 PM GMT -7! With 13 alive, it will take 7 votes for a player to lynched!

Have at it! And have fun!

VOTE: Teamsleep
Trololololol. Random voting is good fun.
Anyway, just one random question to kick it off, what is your favorite role? Choose one, and give your reason for liking it.
-Killing roles are always fun. Even something like PGO is good. Reading the first modpost in the morning and finding out you've killed scum (say, as a vig), or a town PR (as scum) gives a certain satisfaction =P
-Doc is also great. Being able to save one of your teammates from death is also satisfying.
-VT is definitely one of my top roles. While there are no special powers or anything, you have no fear of getting killed, as you're not exactly vital to the group, but your death will open up new avenues to the town.
I'd have to say doc is my favorite role.
That's me answering my question, btw.
Sorry if most of that sounded stupid, I realize I started to ramble in there somewhere.

Anyway, looking forward to having a game with you all.
(Just remembering the game I had with Haoala when I was a doc. Worst game ever, I recall)

Jester's pretty fun too.
